name: Get bplus apps
description: grab the bplus series of apps, currently* Cnidarian, streamdlrs-gui, and searchrs(set your keys in .env) #bplus #mhn
command: git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-searchrs.git && git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-streamdlrs-gui.git && curl -L -o bplus-searchrs/bplus-searchrs https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-searchrs/releases/download/v0.3/bplus-searchrs && curl -L -o bplus-streamdlrs-gui/bplus-streamdlrs-gui https://github.com/mrhappynice/bplus-streamdlrs-gui/releases/download/working/bplus-streamdlrs-gui-termux && chmod +x bplus-searchrs/bplus-searchrs && chmod +x bplus-streamdlrs-gui/bplus-streamdlrs-gui

name: Launch bplus-searchrs
description: LLM powered web search, built-in and connection to SearXNG #bplus #mhn

name: Install llama.cpp [termux]
description: you may install llama-cpp-backend-x, x can = vulkan or opencl

name: Run llama.cpp server
description: pick your hf model with -hf or local dir with -m #llama

name: ðŸ–§ Get Life Manager
description: dl lifeman app from mhn github, #install #life
command: git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/lifeman.git && curl -L -o lifeman/lifeman https://github.com/mrhappynice/lifeman/releases/download/v0.2/lifeman-termux && chmod +x lifeman/lifeman
